Keywords: Defenders , Martial Artist , Marvel Knights , Spider-Man Family
Real Name: Felicia Hardy
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Elevated, Hindering
CAT BURGLAR: Stealth.

November 30, 2020
tyroclix
Win/Loss: 1-2 The Deadpool version finally gets an update and Felicia's cost drops by 40 points! Bring everything needed and nothing you don't. Push to get Perplex and she is ready to support and get a chance at a crit. Great for the cost. EDIT 2021: Ouch, if you cannot choose to take pushing damage then she will only be able to get to click 2 by hitting a Mystic or rolling a crit miss. While she can still be a cheap annoyance, she loses a lot of value from 2020.
